title: SOLD: 1914 Coupon Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 2.5
author: aloondilana

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1914 Coupon Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 2.5
posts.post_content: FS: 1914 Coupon Ty Cobb SGC 2.5 (1 of 2 at that grade w/ one higher). Scarce issue. Only 29 total graded by PSA! 48 total graded by SGC! 77 total pop. One of two graded SGC 2.5 with only one graded higher. Crazy! What’s t206 red portrait pop? Asking SOLD net overnighted. Steal at this price

[quote name="aloondilana" post=2175813]Priced to sell today[/QUOTE]

Great card Danny should go fast.  Maybe take the NLFS heading off so people know it’s available.

[quote name="Jstottlemire1" post=2175857]Great card Danny should go fast.  Maybe take the NLFS heading off so people know it’s available.[/QUOTE]

Oh no that’s my new marketing technique lol!! Thanks buddy. It’s for sale fellas
Final price cut before pulling. Beyond stunned I still own this one with T206 Red Portrait Polar Bear backs in similar condition pulling $7k these days :rolleyes:

Great Looking Card

It will look great in someone’s collection

[quote name="mrreality68" post=2178137]Great Looking Card

It will look great in someone’s collection[/QUOTE]


Thanks Jeff. It looks great in mine. Wish I could afford to keep it but can’t hold onto them all
